__e: Dearly beloved, we are gathered here today... in the sight of God in order to join this woman, Karen... and this man, Paul... in holy matrimony.
Then again, I'm old-fashioned when it comes to the sanctity of marriage.
And you go all the time, and according to this married thing, we are one.
